name: CMGyroData
desc: A single measurement of the device’s rotation rate.

items.name: var rotationRate: CMRotationRate
items.desc: The rotation rate as measured by the device’s gyroscope.

items.name: struct CMRotationRate
items.desc: The type of structures representing a measurement of rotation rate.

items.name: class CMRotationRateData
items.desc: A data object that contains a single rotation-rate measurement.

items.name: class CMRecordedRotationRateData
items.desc: A data object that contains a single rotation-rate measurement at a specific time.
